experiences.title: Woodcore
details: Rebranded landing page, boosted customer acquisition.
Led migration to Typescript for CBA console.
Reduced code bloat by 40k lines, improved DRY.
25% fewer bug reports, 40% fewer code errors post-migration.
Optimized network calls, accelerated loan setup by 30%.
Enhanced admin console for user efficiency.

experiences.title: Lendsqr
details: Collaborated cross-functionally, delivered to 3k+ orgs and 1m+ users.
Mentored 3 junior developers for seamless onboarding.
Initiated brown bag sessions for knowledge sharing.
Conducted code reviews, maintained coding standards.
